website_summaries.verdict: If you want a versatile ladder and are on a budget, this is worth a look if you only need 16 feet.
pros: easy to extend and feels extremely sturdy
cons: Only extends to 16 feet and that may be too short for many workers

customer_reviews.title: Safety hazard, really bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: I almost killed myself using this ladder. After 2 years of proper use and care, this ladder cracked while I was high up and I fell all the way down. Luckily, I fell on a pile of snow, so I only had some bad bruises, but it could have been really bad. After 2 months of fighting with customer service and them accusing me of tampering the product and misusing it, I gave up trying to get the ladder reimbursed or replaced. I'm never buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo P.

customer_reviews.title: A great ladder, but heavy.
customer_reviews.text: My friend was a cable installer, so he became very good at maneuvering ladders, but he ALMOST dropped this one. I don't recommend trying to using this one by yourself unless you are much stronger than I am. Once you muscle this monster into place, this is a great ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: The product comes from a great company and has a strong background.
customer_reviews.text: I love these ladders. I have only and will only purchase Werner ladders. Unfortunately, when my ladder arrived it was damaged. I did not see this on the first inspection since I had one of my employees check the ladder in who is fairly new. I hope to purchase again from this seller. The shipping time was phenomenal. Almost a week earlier than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who delivers a damaged product?!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with a large puncture hole through the ladder rung. Absolutely unacceptable to use a damaged ladder on any job.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Safe ladder
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered on time. I did a quick inspection to ensure no damage during ship. Solid safe extensions ladder.
customer_reviews.author: E. Narramore

customer_reviews.title: Mission Accomplished
customer_reviews.text: The Werner ladder was delivered in great condition, fit my winter gardening needs, and will store well where I measured in our garage to fit it. I do recommend hiring help to move it because it is long. Also, consider securing it with 4' bungee cords to what you are climbing if possible when extending it its full length for extra security.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: First class safety @ great price point!
customer_reviews.text: Great pricing, excellent ladder. Top notch construction. Fiberglass was the "over the top" bonus I wanted for non conductivity. Note: Buy some endcaps to protect your walls. Even max extension of product feels safe.
customer_reviews.author: Bob D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great price and very safe while cleaning my house gutters...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Baker

customer_reviews.title: Climbing to new heights
customer_reviews.text: A great product, extremely well made and will last for years. Will meet most of your outdoor needs.
customer_reviews.author: Car's R Fun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ladder is great but the delivery time was bad didn't think i ever was going to get
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and he feels safer than with the older cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted this to paint the house. Very sturdy and he feels safer than with the older cheap aluminum one we had. Glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: werner ladder
customer_reviews.text: I knew this was the ladder I wanted. Could have bought it locally, but didn't have to pay for shipping or sales tax with Amazon. When the first ladder arrived, it was damaged and totally unusable. I refused the shipment and notified Amazon. The shipment refusal was verified and Amazon immediately had another ladder on its way to me. Second ladder was actually packaged better than the first one and arrived with no damage. I have had nothing but positive experiences buying from Amazon and will continue to buy from them. Can't beat the tax exemptions and their free shipping is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: 69rebel

customer_reviews.title: Rock Solid
customer_reviews.text: I am uses to using an aluminum extension ladder that is rated for 250 lb. I originally thought that I wanted to replace my existing aluminum extension ladder with another aluminum ladder because fiberglass is slightly heavier and I thought that I would not like the added weight. I bought the 20' fiberglass ladder rated for 300 lb. and I am amazed! Aluminum extension ladders have a lot of movement in them when you climb up and down them. This fiberglass extension ladder is rock solid. It's like walking up a stair case! I will never own another aluminum extension ladder again!
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: It is beautifully strong. 60 lbs
customer_reviews.text: It is beautifully strong. 60 lbs. stable. Moving it around tires me so I bought an aluminum match as well
customer_reviews.author: kristi

customer_reviews.title: 2nd ladder is great
customer_reviews.text: The first ladder we received had several areas where the fiberglass was broken, making the ladder unusable(thus the 4 star rating) . We refused the shipment. The second ladder showed up in perfect condition. Can't beat the free shipping. And Amazon made the replacement easy.
customer_reviews.author: milkergirl1

customer_reviews.title: Three stars for great werner ladder but that's why I bought it I ...
customer_reviews.text: Three stars for great werner ladder but that's why I bought it I knew it was a good product..Ladder came damaged and looked as if I had used it for work for two years already.
customer_reviews.author: Vader87

customer_reviews.title: best ladder ever
customer_reviews.text: three generations of my family uses Werner ladders and have never had one fail, bend, or break in the 40+ years that i have been using ladders. Ordered this one because i needed a new one for the new home i just purchased and needed to get up on the roof alot and got tired of borrowing dads. In my opinion these are the best ladders on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Thulsa Doom

customer_reviews.title: 32 foot Ladder
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this purchase. Not only did I save over one-hundred dollars by purchasing it at Amazon but they also delivered it to my door step for free. It only cost $309 and only took about 2weeks to get it. I tried purchasing this from other big vendors such as HomeDepot & Lowes and they wanted $349 plus $65 to $75 for shipping. Amazon Shipped it to my door step. I am so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton J. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Warner 24 extension ladder
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, good price, delivery as expected, ladder is heavy but easy to handle outdoors, leveling feet make it somewhat complicated indoors. Wish I had only bought the20 ft model
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Werner 16'  HDfiberglass ladder
customer_reviews.text: What a great ladder, and delivered to my door. I am very happy with the ladder and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Magee

customer_reviews.title: 24 Foot Werner Fiberglass Extension Ladder
customer_reviews.text: Solid and sturdy, sharp looking. Certainly a professionals choice. Great for any job. A great general purpose ladder. It is not a heavy ladder to have to carry from location to location.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder
customer_reviews.text: 230 lbs, up 20 feet trimming palm trees, what is not to like. Solid. Delivered to my door and put in my garage, no sales tax, less money than the local stores. HD has got some learning to do.
customer_reviews.author: Monterey

customer_reviews.title: Best ladders
customer_reviews.text: Werner makes the best ladders, I'm very happy with this one. At this length it's a 2-man operation to get it in place, though, I find it hard to move around by myself but is manageable if you have to.
customer_reviews.author: David G. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Very good service and excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The product is accurately described in the Amazon.com description. It is long and weights over forty pounds. It required special shipment handling due to its size. The delivery was on-time and the ladder is great. I highly recommend the product and company to all.
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh D Warner

customer_reviews.title: Broken ladder foot
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ladder, but it arrived with a severely twisted foot making it unusable safely. I can find NO contact information for ordering a replacement foot and no way to contact the seller. I need help!!! This product is not a great value when it can't be used. All other aspects of this transaction were great.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lofts

customer_reviews.title: Best ext. ladder if you need to reach 2nd floor gutters.
customer_reviews.text: Very stable extension ladder if you need to clean your second floor gutters or climb up on the roof. Best if used by two people due to it's weight and length.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN SULLIVAN

customer_reviews.title: No protective packaging -- Ladder will be damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: First ladder arrived unpackaged.... banged up with frayed exposed fiberglass in several spots. I refused shipment, wrote Amazon an email about the lack of any protective packaging, and looked forward to a replacement. The replacement ladder arrived again, without packaging, banged up, chipped, and chunks of fiberglass missing. This was the second ladder to arrive without protective packaging. I was not able to inspect when the driver dropped off the second ladder. Amazon says I can haul a 24' ladder to a place that will ship it and they will replace it. Not easy with a small car, and there is a high probability the third ladder will arrive like the other two. Stuck with damaged ladder!
customer_reviews.author: mark applegate

customer_reviews.title: Werner "20' Extension ladder"
customer_reviews.text: Werner's labeling on this ladder (and probably their other extension ladders) is deceptive. It is listed as a 20 foot ladder. Additionally, the "maximum reach" is listed as 19 feet. However, when the ladder is fully extended, it is only 17 feet long. The two individual segments, if laid end-to-end, are 20 feet long. The "maximum reach" assumes someone of 5'6" height is standing at the highest recommended rung (IOW, their height combined with the ladder). Why does Werner use such ambiguous specifications? Wouldn't it be a lot more simple and intuitive to list the maximum extended length to be 17 feet?
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: The Ladder of Success!
customer_reviews.text: I safely moved up in the world with this purchase! It is an excellent quality extension ladder. Safely reaches to where I need to be. Better and safer by far than my old aluminum extension ladder that seemed to shift with every movement I made. I had an opportunity to try this ladder out when my neighbor offered me the use of his Werner extension ladder. I liked it enough to buy my own. I have since purchased theand theas a backsaving accessories. Now I can easily lift and roll the ladder to where I need it without straining my back. I also use theand the. Werner ladders are sturdy and well worth the price! ~ The Boss
customer_reviews.author: J. Nowicki

customer_reviews.title: Werner Used To Be One Of The Best.  Not Anymore
customer_reviews.text: After only three years of relatively light use (non-commercial), a fiberglass rail has split and the ladder is now worthless. I'm amazed how far downhill Werner products have slipped. There are better made ladders out there at comparable prices. I can't imagine I'll purchase another Werner ladder again.
customer_reviews.author: 2manyfenders

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ladder
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is very solid. It extends and retracts without hanging up. This is an size excellent choice for people with a two story home. It is light and yet very solid even when fully extended. If you are not sure if you need a 300lb duty rating consider your own weight (also consider what you may weigh in 5 years :)) plus what ever you may be carrying (shingles, tools, a bag of cement). You won't be sorry your ladder is more than strong enough to handle the task. I also bought a levelerthat makes this ladder great on uneven ground or perpendicular on steps (stairs).
customer_reviews.author: Clement

customer_reviews.title: Extension Ladder
customer_reviews.text: I like the solid feel of this ladder, and you can do electrial work and you are not grounded. I use it with the automatic ladder leveler, and quick click stabilizer. Both of which I think are very good, and wouldn't use the ladder without.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Krenitsky

customer_reviews.title: Way overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Ladder is great. But why someone would pay over $300 for it when it's under $200 at Lowe's is insane
customer_reviews.author: JerseyLionFan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: You would be 50 bucks ahead by going to Lowes oe Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Checkers

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladder
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ladder to climb to the second story of the house. Was a bit concerned by all the negative coments about shipping but took the risk. Ladder came with no issues works great and was dilivered a promissed. No nicks or broken issues would definitly buy from them again. Best ladder made in America.
customer_reviews.author: :08 Sec

customer_reviews.title: Go to Lowe's
customer_reviews.text: This same ladder is at Lowe's for $239.00. How can it be so much through Amazon? I've read it three times and it's the same 24', Rated 1A at 300lbs
customer_reviews.author: Wayne S.

customer_reviews.title: Werner Ladders - bad design and no company support
customer_reviews.text: I've had a Werner attic ladder for 4 years... the ladder leg hinge broke. I've used the ladder a total of 12 times and I'm under the weight limit for the ladder. The company's response... buy a new $300 ladder and pay $200 for someone to install it. BAD COMPANY
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Werner D6216-2 Extension-ladders, 16-Foot
product_meta.description:
Size Name:16 FeetExtra heavy-duty professional use extension ladder. External guides at top of base section securely interlock rails (2 sets on 36 Ft. and 40 Ft. models). Base and fly separate easily to use base section as single ladder. Internal guides on bottom fly section securely interlock rails. Slip-resistant Traction-Tred 1-1/2 In. flat D-rungs. Durable rail shield bracket and shoe with Shu-Lok , slip-resistant pad and spur plate plus exclusive Alfo rung joint means Twist-Proof safe performance. Electrically non-conductive orange rails. Rope and pulley on 20 Ft. and larger only. Fiberglass ladders should not be stored in direct sunlight. Ultravoilet rays could weaken the polyester resins over extended exposure.

AMAZON.COM
Designed for industrial use, Werner D6200-2 Series Fiberglass D-Rung Extension ladders provide the stability you need for all your heavy duty-jobs. Ideal for everything from commercial and residential construction to facilities maintenance, these ladders are the industry standard for 300-pound-rated fiberglass extension ladders. And because their rails are made of fiberglass, Werner D6200-2 are recommended for use around electricity. So whether you need to access a roof or work from the ladder itself, your D6200 Series ladder will help you get the job done.




D6200-2 Series Fiberglass
D-Rung Extension Ladders
At a Glance: * 300-pound load capacity
   
   
 * Non-conductive fiberglass side rails
   
   
 * ALFLO rung joints for twist-free performance
   
   
 * Slip-resistant Traction-Tred D-rungs
   
   
 * Smooth-operating pulleys and interlocking rails
   
   
 * Base section can be used as a single ladder
   
   
 * Rugged gravity spring locks
   
   
 * Durable rail shield bracket and shoe with Shu-Lok slip-resistant pad and spur plate


Exclusive ALFLO rung joint means Twist-Proof Performance to ensure a safe climb.View larger.
Durable action feet for use on hard or penetrable surfaces. View larger.Built for Safety and Durability
D6200-2 ladders have a Type IA duty rating, which means they have a load capacity of 300 pounds. Completely dependable, each ladder features slip-resistant Traction-Tred 1-1/2-inch D-rungs that provide a level, comfortable standing surface. And because Werner D6200-2 Series ladders are made with fiberglass non-conductive rails they are recommended for use around electricity.For durability, this series includes many features, such as the exclusive ALFLO rung joint, rugged gravity spring locks, durable rail shield brackets, shoes with Shu-Lok slip-resistant pad and spur plate, and molded rung braces.

Twist-Proof Connections and Shu-Lok Feet
D6200 Series ladders feature the patented ALFLO rung-to-rail connections that help keep the ladder from twisting during use.

The Shu-Lok slip-resistant pad and spur plate can rest flat or in spur position for soft ground. During setup, the Shu-Lok feature holds each foot in position. This means your hands are free to properly set up the ladder.

Easy to Extend and Separate
Each Werner D6200 Series ladder is easy to extend thanks to external guides at the top of the base section and internal guides on the bottom of the fly section. In addition, the rugged gravity spring locks operate smoothly.

Also, each ladder utilizes a smooth-operating, heavy-duty rope and pulley and features a rope clamp that ties the rope to the rung (the 16-foot model is not equipped with rope and pulley). For further convenience, the base and fly sections separate easily, so you can use the base section as a single ladder.

Hassle-Free Accessory Installation
For further convenience, pre-pierced holes on the rails make for easy field installation of accessories, including Pole Lashes, Cable Hook and V-Rung Assembly, and others. Click here for a full list of Werner Ladder accessories.

About Werner: The Pros' Choice
Werner, the most trusted name in ladders, is preferred by pros more than any other brand. For over 60 years, pros have looked to Werner to supply their climbing equipment needs. Werner manufactures a full line of safe, professional-grade products for any job, and it builds its ladders to withstand even the most challenging tasks--that's why Werner ladders are found on more jobsites than any other brand.

What's in the Box
Fiberglass D-rung extension ladder.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This extra heavy duty fiberglass extension ladder has a duty rating of 300 pounds (type IA). It is made of nonconductive fiberglass rails for added safety in case of electrical hazards. The rungs are aluminum slip-resistant Traction-Tred D rungs. Rungs are connected to the rails with Werner's exclusive Alflo rung joint connection for Twist-Proof performance. External guides at the top of the base section securely interlock rails. Rugged gravity spring locks operate smoothly. Base and fly sections separate easily to use the base section as a single ladder. Shu-Lok, durable rail shield bracket and shoe with slip-resistant pad and spur plate. This model is NOT equipped with a rope and pulley.
